metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28367 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: OWASP AntiSamy before 1.6.6 allows XSS via HTML tag smuggling on STYLE content with crafted input. The output serializer does not properly encode the supposed Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) content.

criterions.comment: libowasp-antisamy-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
